name: Gears for Breakfast
detail:
Gears for Breakfast is an independent game studio with it's first title "A Hat in Time" on its way!
Gears for Breakfast was formed upon the announcement of A Hat in Time. Thus far, A Hat in Time is their only game.

A Hat in Time was released on October 5, 2017.
